An elegie upon the death of the Reverend Mr. Thomas Shepard, late teacher of the church at Charlstown in New-England: / By a great admirer of his worth, and true mourner for his death. Oakes, Urian, 1631-1681.
16 p.
Printed by Samuel Green., Cambridge [Mass.], : 1677.
Signed: Urian Oakes. Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
=======
